Fault.name: BPELProcess1.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns13:RowSet" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.

Fault.name: BPELProcess1.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns13:Row" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
